eshmun.expression.modalities.binary

Class EVModality

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.expression.AbstractExpression
      • eshmun.expression.modalities.AbstractCTLModality
        • eshmun.expression.modalities.BinaryCTLModality
          • eshmun.expression.modalities.binary.EVModality
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitable

    public class EVModality
extends BinaryCTLModality
    This class represents an EV CTL Modality. (Release)

    An EV Modality has the following form E[leftChild V rightChild], where all children are AbstractExpressions.

    V is the dual of U, i.e. (leftChild V rightChild) whenever (!leftChild U !rightChild) is false.

    Notice that this is part of the minimal set of modalities, therefore it cannot be simplified. Simplifying this modality will only result in simplifying its children.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kinan Dak Al Bab
    See Also:
    BinaryCTLModality, AUModality, AbstractExpression

      • negate

        public AbstractExpression negate()
        Negates this expression.

        This is one of minimal modalities, negation is done by passing this to a not operator.

        Specified by:
        negate in class AbstractExpression
        Returns:
        a simplified expression that is the negation of this expression.

      • simplify

        public AbstractExpression simplify()
        Simplifies this expression.

        This is one of the minimal modalities, simplification is simplifying the children.

        Specified by:
        simplify in class AbstractExpression
        Returns:
        a simplified equivalent expression.

      • toNNF

        public AbstractExpression toNNF()
        Converts the current expression to NNF.

        This method is guaranteed to return an equivalent expression.

        Negative Normal Form has the negations adjacent to the variables (inside). Implications and Equivalnces are simplified into ands, ors, and nots.

        As for CTL Modalities, This method will reduce everything down to AX, EX, AU, EU.

        Specified by:
        toNNF in class AbstractExpression
        Returns:
        an expression that is the CNF equivalent of this expression.

      • reduceToAU

        public NotOperator reduceToAU()
        Reduces this Modality into an AU Modality using E[pVq] == !A[!pU!q].
        Returns:
        An Equivalent negated AUModality.

      • clone

        public EVModality clone()
        Clones this EVModality.

        Please note that while the operator is copied, the child is not. Changes in the child could affect more than one EVModality.

        Specified by:
        clone in class AbstractExpression
        Returns:
        a shallow copy of this EVModality.
